alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 08 at 3:39AM MST until May 08 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR ALL OF NORTHERN ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...All of northern Arizona. This includes portions of the Apache-Sitgreaves National Forest, Coconino National Forest, Kaibab National Forest, Prescott National Forest and Tonto National Forest. * WINDS...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Local gusts up to 60 mph downwind of high terrain features like the Kaibab Plateau. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 to 15 percent. Humidity trending closer to 15 to 20 percent in the higher mountains above 7000 ft. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.
